# Brawler, Greater
## Overview
*Brawler, Greater*: While raging, the barbarian is treated as if she has [[Two-Weapon Fighting (Feat)|Two-Weapon Fighting]] when making unarmed strike attacks. A barbarian must have the [[Brawler|brawler]] rage power to select this rage power.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 74
